item.title: Introduction
item.description: This is a guide for how to use the power tools dsefs asset brought to you by the Vanguard team. Motivation DSEFS is a relatively new part of DSE with particularly useful capabilities within the analytics space. The purpose of DSEFS is to prevent the need for DSE users with needs for a basic distributed file system to satisfy some of their real time DSE powered workloads from having to go install HDFS / call in a hadoop vendor.
